*FAQs*

*1ï¸âƒ£ What is the battery back-up of the Trakbond tracker?*

- The tracker offers *flexible battery life*: expect *8-12 hours* on active days and *up to 36 hours* when the device is less active (e.g., kept in a bag).

*2ï¸âƒ£ Does the Trakbond tracker come with a SIM card?*

- Yes! Each tracker includes a *pre-installed SIM card* that works exclusively with our devices, offering *nationwide coverage in India*.
- Plus, you get a *3-month FREE subscription* to start!

*3ï¸âƒ£ How big and heavy is the Trakbond tracker?*

- Our tracker is designed to be *compact and lightweight* for everyday comfort and ease of use.
- It weighs just *40 grams* and measures *4cm x 4cm*.

*4ï¸âƒ£ What are the attachment options available for the Trakbond tracker?*

- The tracker is equipped with *multiple attachment options* to suit your needs.
- It comes with a *carabiner*, an *extensible loop thread*, and a *protective silicone case with a belt loop*, making it easy to wear in various ways (*clipped, hung, or slipped into a pocket*).

Hi *{{1}}*,

Thank you for choosing Trakbond! Let's get your device set up and ready for use.

Step-by-Step Setup:

*1. Install the Trakbond App & Register:*
- Download the Trakbond app from the App Store or Google Play Store.
- Click 'Register' and create your account.

*2. Charge Your Device:*
- Charge the device for 2 hours using the provided charger.
- Switch it ON and follow the pairing instructions on the app.

*3. Activate the SIM:*
- Take the device outdoors under a clear sky for 40-60 minutes to activate the pre-installed SIM.
- Once activated, you can view the real-time location in the app.

*Next Steps:*
- Attach the device to anyone or anything you want to track when going outdoors.

 Best regards,
*Trakbond Support Team*

Hi *{{1}}*,

Your Trakbond device is now set up and ready to use! Here are some exciting features to help you make the most out of it:

*1. Real-Time Tracking:*
 - Monitor the live location of your loved ones directly from the app.

*2. Safe Zones:*
- Create safe zones and get alerts when the device enters or leaves these areas.

*3. Caregroup:*
- Share access with family members or caregivers for collaborative tracking.

*3. Timeline View:*
- View the movement history to understand the travel patterns and ensure safety.

*5. SOS Alerts:*
 - When the device is turned on, the power button functions as the SOS safety button. 

*NOTE:* Due to safety reasons, the *device does not have a power-off button*. Once the device is turned on, it can only be turned off when its battery is drained.

 Best regards,
*Trakbond Support Team*

Hi *{{1}}*,

We hope you're enjoying your Trakbond device. Here are some frequently asked questions and troubleshooting tips:

*FAQs:*
- *Battery Charging Time:* 2 hours for a full charge.
- *Battery Backup Time:* 8-36 hours depending on usage.
- *Multiple Devices:* Yes, you can track from multiple phones using the same account.

*Need More Help?*
- Just message Trakbond Support on WhatsApp at the number +91 8882543333 to get help with your query.

 Best regards,
*Trakbond Support Team*

Hi *{{1}}*,

If your screen is showing 'Initializing Device' after pairing the TrailID, please follow these steps:

1. *Charge the Device:*
- Plug in your device and charge it for 2 hours.

2. *Switch It ON:*
- Turn on the device after itâ€™s fully charged.

3. *Take the Device Outdoors:*
- Take the device under the open sky (like a roof or park) for 40-60 minutes. Make sure it is moving and outdoors to help with activation.

*SIM Card Activation:*
- To activate the pre-installed SIM card, the device needs to be outdoors and moving. Charge the device for 2 hours, switch it on, and take it with you outdoors for 40-60 minutes. The activation process may take a few hours to a day, depending on your location.

Once activated, you will be able to see the device location on the Trakbond mobile app.

Thank you for your patience!

 Best regards,
*Trakbond Support Team*

Hi *{{1}}*,

We'd love to hear about your experience with Trakbond so far. Your feedback helps us improve and provide the best service possible.

*Questions:*
- How easy was it to set up your Trakbond device?
- What feature do you find most useful?

Thank you for being a part of the Trakbond family!

 Best regards,
*Trakbond Support Team*
